name: Escaping from time
description:
Angus has just discovered one of the coolest things in the world, the time machine, but his coworkers and boss think it can destroy humanity, so they want to kill Angus and destroy the invention. Angus will have to use his time machine to find the way out of his workplace. 
Will he be able to escape?

KeyBindings:

- A, D to move horizontally
- Spacebar to jump
- W, S to climbing stairs.

- Rightclick to shoot and interact.

- Q to activate electricity power (when unlocked)
- E to change size (when unlocked)
